summary: The 'Validate Prior Learning to Accelerate Employment Act' (H.R. 1446) amends the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act. It focuses on identifying and utilizing assessments to measure individuals' existing knowledge, skills, and abilities (KSAs), primarily for adults and dislocated workers. The bill aims to facilitate the awarding of postsecondary credentials, inform individual employment plans, and help individuals showcase their KSAs to employers. It also provides support for employers adopting skills-based hiring practices.
